seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Data Warehouse' without seniority indicator, standard data engineering skills required, no years of experience specified

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both batch and real-time processing, DBT for batch pipelines, Hadoop/Spark for batch processing, data warehouse focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of leadership responsibilities, mentoring, or team management - focused on individual contributor technical work

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider mentioned, tools mentioned (Spark, Hadoop, DBT, Snowflake) are cloud-agnostic

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job explicitly mentions 'both batch and real-time processing'

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tool mentioned, DBT mentioned but no orchestrator like Airflow or Step Functions

storage_layer.evidence: Title mentions 'Data Warehouse', Snowflake preferred (warehouse), Hadoop mentioned (lake), suggests both patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: Pass 1 shows specific_countries restriction with only 'IN' allowed, onsite work model

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in Kochi, India with India-only restriction implies relocation needed for non-India residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: India-based role, no visa sponsorship mentioned, H1B not applicable for Indian positions

benefits_level.evidence: Pass 1 shows no benefits mentioned in job posting
